description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 23.

Note that solving this bug will create code used by multiple entities, not just "server", since multiple entities can be created via POST /<entity type>.
title: Support POST /servers in the API

comments.content:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 23.

Note that solving this bug will create code used by multiple entities, not just "server", since multiple entities can be created via POST /<entity type>.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gundlach
